charges.charge_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR

charges.charge_description: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE(1r)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 42 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three years. Restitution is ordered in the amount of $7,100.00. A Special Assessment of $100.00 is due immediately.

charges.charge_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR

charges.charge_description: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE(1r)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to count one of the indictment on May 16, 2018. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 34 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of two years. The defendant shall pay to the United States a special assessment of $100.

charges.charge_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:1951.F: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR

charges.charge_description: INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE(1r)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 36 months. Upon release, he shall be on supervised release for 3 years. Defendant is ordered to pay a special assessment of $100.00 and restitution in the amount of $7,100.00.
